Reviews.Title: DSLR Carry Pouch
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I knew that it wouldn't pack everything I wanted to carry, but it is amazing how much you can get into the Pouch.  It protects my Sony A77 prefectly.  Still have room for extra Batteries and filters.  Excellent value.  Price is really good and the pouch well made. Perfect for protection for the camera between picture locations and easily opened when it comes time to start using the camera.  Great size, not too big and bulky.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera bag
Reviews.Author: Cecelia Pena
Reviews.Content: I wanted a bag I can take out on a shoot that my camera fits easily into while I'm walking around without carrying all my gear.  I want to protect my camera, mainly, and this does the trick.  I can actually fit all my stuff except for an extra lens which I end up sticking in my pocket.  So far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Fits my Nikon D3200 just fine.
Reviews.Author: RL
Reviews.Content: I would love to have gotten it in another color but blue will do. Otherwise, the right size bag for my DSLR, spare batteries and a few small accessories. That's what I was hoping for. That's what I got.

Reviews.Title: It's a good sturdy bag.
Reviews.Author: jinx
Reviews.Content: It's a bit smaller than I was hoping for but it should work well for carrying all my equipment on a day trip.

Reviews.Title: solid item
Reviews.Author: D. Griego "Aztlano"
Reviews.Content: Just what I expected no problem.  Holds the camera securely with room for small items like extra battery and memory card.

Reviews.Title: Nice Case
Reviews.Author: Mad Dog
Reviews.Content: My Nikon D3200 fits nicely inside. The only thing I would change is to make the strap detachable. In most cases the handle is all I need. Otherwise it is solid and well designed.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional camera case for your DSLR!
Reviews.Author: Peter Haight
Reviews.Content: I am an amateur photographer with a little under two years experience. I just recently bought my first DSLR, a Nikon D3200. After using an old lunch box to hold my camera body and lens for about a week of traveling and photographing at various locations I realized it probably was time to invest in a nice case. I've had this case for a little while now and it fits my Nikon snug as a rug, lens on and off. The strap is very comfortable, and adjustable, there's plenty of pockets for goodies (such as filters, spare batteries, a charger, flash drives, SD cards, lens cloths, and whatever else you might want to bring along with you.) That being said, it is a *very* snug fit and I wouldn't recommend stuffing lots of accessories into it because of that. This case represents an exceptional bargain. I paid around $20 for mine, and with Amazon Prime I got it in two days. It fits everything I need it to and more! Very lightweight but super durable! If you're unsure of what case to buy as a beginner to DSLRs, this is one you won't want to miss.

Reviews.Title: As promised
Reviews.Author: Rick Porter
Reviews.Content: Took about a week to arrive. The strap has a nice pad for those who walk a lot with it over their shoulder. Fit my Nikon D5300 with 18 - 140 lens prefect. The pockets have more than big enough to extra SD memory cards, 2 extra batteries and an extra filter or two. It's light weight and well padded. I'll be using it for a backpacking trip across the bottom of the Grand Canyon in two weeks. The only negative thing so far is the strap was not set up to be removed without doing some damage to it or the metal ring that holds it to the case (minus one star). I was going to exchange a soft elastic strap for the hike. But I decided to go with the padded strap it came with and see how it works over the 38 miles of trail.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Size
Reviews.Author: AgateShadow
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my camera, the camera fits perfectly inside, no tightness, it is a Fuji Film S4800 camera.

Reviews.Title: Handy!
Reviews.Author: new customer
Reviews.Content: This bag is great. Is is well cushioned on all sides and has an adjustable cushion inside to help keep the camera from jostling around. The shoulder strap is exceptionally well designed to contour around the neck comfortably. It is perfect for my uses.

Reviews.Title: Safe and Sturdy
Reviews.Author: PhoneUser
Reviews.Content: A good camera case for fieldwork, with well-designed straps and plenty of grab-points for when one is climbing about in the rocks.  Excellent padding, and good storage for small necessities.

Reviews.Title: Good decision by me to buy this :)
Reviews.Author: Dave Ross
Reviews.Content: Great bag for the Nikon D3200.  Fits perfectly with the 55-200mm lens.  Heavy duty and well padded.  A few small extra zippered pockets to hold your remote and spare battery.. or other small items.

Reviews.Title: Like it...
Reviews.Author: Raquel Medina
Reviews.Content: Fits my Nikon D600 quite fine.  Seems robust, correct size and handy.  Can fit  medium size lenses, charger as well.

Reviews.Title: The case for my digital camera Sony DSC-HX100V was OK.
Reviews.Author: Sebastiano
Reviews.Content: The case for my digital camera Sony DSC-HX100V was OK.I can protect my camera with the Lens Adapter installedSebastiano Franceschino

Reviews.Title: Perfect size camera bag
Reviews.Author: Lowell
Reviews.Content: This is the perfects sized camera bag. Not too big and not too small. Perfect for a camera, zoom lense and you can even put your keys inside.

Reviews.Title: Be sure the size is what you need, durable.
Reviews.Author: Terry N. Braun
Reviews.Content: This isn't a large camera case.  I can get a camera with a short lens and an extra lens at the bottom but it is a tight fit.  The pouches and pockets are similarly a bit snug.  It is a well constructed case.  If the size is acceptable, the durability is a strong plus.

Reviews.Title: Great little Case
Reviews.Author: M1F Captain
Reviews.Content: Works perfect for what we need it to do.  Doesn't hold much more than the camera with lens attached and charger.  Might be able to place another lens inside.

Reviews.Title: great value!
Reviews.Author: Ann Knodt
Reviews.Content: i've had this bag for a month or so and really like it so far - fits my nikon D40 well (even with telephoto) and seems to be good quality and durable.

Reviews.Title: It's good for the purpose it's meant to serve
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: If you want a case to hold your camera and protect it from some dust a little moister and the occasional bumping softly into things inside a back pack or around your shoulder this is a good case you have enough room to hold lens covers, lens hood a few cords extra memory cards, extra battery, small stuff like that. Just enough to bring your camera with you on a day trip, hiking or some other short activities. It is NOT big enough for extra lenses, a ton of cleaning equipment, lots of filters, or anything where you would need more than the camera a smaller lens and a few small objects.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Versatile Bag
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: I have a Kodak SLR style camera which fits perfectly in the small compact bag where you could also carry two pair of glasses in their own cases. The flexible and soft divider protects the camera very well from the charger cable and strap. Plus it also has inside and outside pockets to put different memory cards and even money.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Gina Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is a great  and sturdy camera case, especially for the price.  I am very happy with the purchase. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Fit great
Reviews.Author: Kati
Reviews.Content: I was able to put both my SLR and my point-n-shoot in the case and then pack it in my carry-on for a recent trip. Great size.

Reviews.Title: Speedy delivery and great price
Reviews.Author: fdrb266
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift.  I was looking for a compact lightweigt case that was easy to carry. This case fit the bill and was just as described.  Delivery was fast.

Reviews.Title: Nice bag!
Reviews.Author: Mary Wille
Reviews.Content: This camera bag works well for my purchase of the Nikon D3200. It is lightweight and comfortable to put over your shoulder. Nice color also.

Reviews.Title: Nifty
Reviews.Author: Ryan F.
Reviews.Content: Not a whole lot of pockets or space but I am happy that I do not have to remove the lens from my DLSR to store the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Brand new Evecase case. inner size: W x L x H : 6.5 Top/3.5 bottom in x 3.75in x 8.25in
Closed cell foam padding for great protection
Rugged nylon materials. Back belt loop for easy attachment
Large front zip pocket for accessories, inner zip pocket for memory cards.
Adjustable carrying strap. Adjustable inner divider to hold camera more sturdy and keep accessories apart.
ProductInfo.Name: Evecase Durable Compact Digital SLR Camera Carrying Pouch Nylon Case with Strap- Black/Blue for Nikon D610 D600 D3200 D7100 D5200 D5300 D3300; Pentax K-5, Fujifilm DSLR
